'''Guardian's Flower''' is an [[Artifact]] in the set [[Defender's Will]].

==Description==
Only that [[Crimson Witch of Flame|maiden]]'s clear voice,<br>Could cause the guardian's brow to come unbound.

Their time together was short.<br>At last, the knight's blood would run dry,<br>As would her tears and her songs.
